descriptions.overview: Known for exceptional quality and dependability, Standart PRO undermount sinks feature straight walls and tight-radius corners designed for easy cleaning. Built to impress with rugged T304 construction, wear-resistant finish, and industry-best NoiseDefend soundproofing technology, this KRAUS sink is designed to outperform any comparable sink on the market. Undermount installation creates an uninterrupted transition from sink to countertop for a seamless look
list: KITCHEN SET INCLUDES: Sink, Bottom Grid, Basket Strainer, Kraus kitchen towel, mounting hardware
UNDERMOUNT DESIGN creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop and makes it easy to wipe water and crumbs straight into the sink
TIGHT-RADIUS CORNERS designed for a contemporary look and easy cleaning
DURABLE AND DENT-RESISTANT sink made with premium TRU16 real 16-gauge T304 stainless steel
HIGH-CAPACITY SINK: Deep bowl with flat bottom prevents glassware from tipping and offers ample capacity for stacking dishes
FULLY INSULATED WITH NOISEDEFEND: Extra-thick pads cover all sides of the sink to absorb unwanted noise and vibration
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY: Satisfaction guaranteed with customer service that puts you first
Outer Sink Dimensions: 32-in. L x 19-in. W x 10-in. D; minimum Cabinet Size: 36-in
LONG-LASTING RUST-RESISTANT FINISH will not dull from daily use

specs.title: Items Required for Assembly
specs.spec: Measuring tape, plumber's putty, adjustable wrench, silicone caulk, pipe wrench, pliers

reviews.title: "Rusted Sink in 2 weeks of installation... 0 star"
reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! Sink was rusted after 2 weeks of installation.  Surface of the sink is never dry and the water sits on the since caused dis coloration and rust overtime (2 weeks). I just completed my reno and this sink is causing nightmare for me.  Now i have to try to find a drop in sink and replace with this one.  See the photo I've attached.  The only good thing about this sink it's beautiful to look at when it's not in used (dry & polished) ...  Everything else is pain to try to keep it dry and required wiping off the water sitting on the surface all the time to prevent rust.
reviews.author: MaryJain

reviews.title: "Under a week rusted"
reviews.text: This sink is uncleanable and rusted in under a week. Really disappointed and looking to return it.
reviews.author: Alyssa

reviews.title: "I LOVE This Sink! And the Kraus faucet, too!"
reviews.text: Getting new countertops was exciting enough, but this Kraus stainless sink and matching pull down faucet are totally icing on the cake!This sink is so deep, if you're standing across the room, you don't even see what's hiding there. I added a small dishdrainer to the left side of the sink and it holds plenty of washed dishes and pans while leaving ample room to clean my biggest soup kettle, saute pan or 1/2 sheet pan. I'm a cook, so I spend a lot, I mean a LOT, of time at the sink. This Kraus stainless sink makes me happy to suds up and watch the birds while cleaning up. Thanks, Kraus!
reviews.author: Ideas2Art

reviews.title: "Great So Far!"
reviews.text: This is a solid purchase and I am super happy with it.  I did a lot of research on sinks and this was by far the best bang for your buck and it looks amazing.  The people complaining about the water spots and puddling are just being overly particular.  I have not had any issues.  Oh and its SOOOO DEEP.  No more water splashing everywhere when washing dishes.  Does not sound like a tin can either.  like I said, solid.  It comes with some nice accessories also; all you need to hook it up.  Only caution i have is the depth of the sink can mess up your drain configuration underneath with a garbage disposal.  I had to completely redo my plumbing to the drain line.  If you are questioning it, just buy it!
reviews.author: Chris

reviews.title: "Extended drain trap issue"
reviews.text: Absolutely adore this sink. Unfortunately the drain where the food is caught, extends at least three inches below the already (wonderful) 10" depth. So for new building, the plumber can accommodate the extended size. But for our 70's-ish house, it caused a problem. The plumber had to replace these with standard drains, booo ! The sink is deep and a nice  heavy gauge. I wish we could have seen this in the store before purchase. I don't remember seeing this listed in the detail section of the sink (on Lowes.com) I still would purchase this sink tho. It's a (IMO) commercial grade. I hope to get many years enjoyment ......definitely worth the extra money. The others (in the store) seemed so cheaply made
reviews.author: TinaB

reviews.title: "Great addition to my kitchen"
reviews.text: I love this faucet. While I would like to point out that it is pretty tall, taller than I imagined, I wouldn't trade it for the world. I love the look, the styling, the workmanship. You know you've bought quality the minute you set your eyes on it. The faucet disconnects and reconnects easily but stays in place as it should. The spray feature cleans my dishes nicely of food particle and is hard enough to remove stubborn particle before putting in the dishwasher. This faucets eliminates the need for a separate sprayer which as you can see in the picture made it possible for me to install a soap dispenser. I love it! I would buy this again.
reviews.author: KarenEL58

reviews.title: "Exceeded ALL of my Expectations and MORE"
reviews.text: We had a Moen that lasted 2 years with one repair to the braided cord leaking and constant cleaning of the nozzle. I took a chance on a brand that I knew nothing about that you don't hear of often and I couldn't be happier. I'm a deep research type of person and I read a lot of reviews. There weren't many on this faucet but all that I read were positive. This faucet is SOLID! I don't have to clean finger print smudges, built up crud, and most of all I don't have to worry about a flimsy recess cord. Filling up pots is a breeze and it adds a modern contemporary look that adds style to our kitchen. I love it!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: FLGirl3622

reviews.title: "AMAZING! The wife and I LOVE this faucet."
reviews.text: My wife has wanted a nice big pre rinse faucet. Myself, I only like to buy nicer, higher quality items and was hesitant given limited reviews and not a brand I was familiar with. I just finished installing this and have to say this is the nicest, highest quality faucet I've seen. I am totally happy with the robust, heavy duty feel and appearance. Install was simple and straightforward. Best of all, my wife absolutely loves this and thanks me every day for buying and installing. If you want this type of faucet, do yourself a favor and buy from Lowe's!
reviews.author: BlazinPond

reviews.title: "Great product, only had a week"
reviews.text: Purchased this because of the good reviews, easy install. I like this product however I noticed the sprayer head is plastic, why not medal of the whole body is metal. I noticed a scratch on the faucet, but I'm still happy.
reviews.author: Patric

reviews.title: "5-Star Kitchen Sink"
reviews.text: Got this one from Lowe's for our new kitchen. It's beautifully hand made, deep, shinning, solid and no echoing noise when water hits the sink. Kraus makes great efforts and truly shows they care about the product and customers- the sink is nicely wrapped in a nice bag and all accessories packed neatly in the box. It even comes with a towel that can hang on the cabinet handle. The sink is just flawless. At $270 this is the best value and a steal. This is the first time I bought Kraus product and it won me over for futur purchase.
reviews.author: HW

reviews.title: "THE BEST SINK THAT CAN BE BOUGHT!"
reviews.text: We replaced our counters with granite and thought the sink should be upgraded.  Bought the under-mount sink thru Lowes sight unseen and couldn't be happier.  Everyone comments how classy it looks.  I thought the rack that fits in the bottom of sink may be hard to keep clean, but NOT!!!! About once a month I put a scoop of Oxyclean in the sink, cover rack with water and let it soak about a half hour.  Clean it with my brush and looks like new!  What a quality unit and exceptional service from Kraus!
reviews.author: Karenvp

reviews.title: "Good looking sink"
reviews.text: This sink looks great. Love the rack that you can put in bottom for drying or to prevent scratching.
reviews.author: Dallas

reviews.title: "Looks great and I've read many great reviews"
reviews.text: To the person that wrote the sink dings (the person that even changed his profile name to write a second bad review within a week's time), I've never seen a stainless steel sink where the divider wasn't as high as the rim of the outer edge of the sink.  As you said, this is your first stainless steel sink so I'm not sure what else you've had or what you grew up with in your mom's kitchen, but all of the other reviews are excellent.  Maybe you just should stick to cast iron sinks?  That way you can break your drinking glasses instead of "dinging" your sink.  We will all pray that you don't catch a bacterial infection.
reviews.author: JK

reviews.title: "High Quality"
reviews.text: This Kraus sink is a high end sink. The manufacturer really went above and beyond with it and the price was better than I would have expected. I think Lowes should put them in there stores for people to see what real quality should look like. I ordered it online and didn't expect it to be this nice. Kudos to Kraus!
reviews.author: Homeowner-Contractor

reviews.title: "Great product at reasonable price."
reviews.text: We bought sight unseen as the local Lowe's had none in stock. Cost was about $100 more than the low-end stainless sinks in stock but quality and features much better. Product was carefully packaged in Styrofoam, cardboard, and a separate bag to prevent scratches. The sink itself is a decently-heavy gauge material with a nice scratch-free finish. Appears to be stamped from a single sheet and corners have a nice generous radius. Flanges and edges are nicely deburred. Was pleasantly surprised to find the entire backside covered with a layer of sound dampening material, instead of the typical few small pads. Was provided with mounting brackets as well as machine screws and glue-in threaded inserts for use with a solid surface or granite counter top. Has great accessories. The included drying rack is well-made and includes not only plastic anti-scratch pads installed but a little bag of extra pads a well. The included drain is well-made and has a nice pull-out basket to make cleaning easy.Lowes should promote this product and stock it in their stores.
reviews.author: JMCLT

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink!"
reviews.text: My only comment would be if you are using this in a remodel, you may not be able to use the sink drainer without major plumbing reconfigurations.  This is a terrific 10" deep sink which means the existing plumbing may not be at the right height for the drain.  You can always go with a conventional sink drainer, but dang, the Kraus one was so cool!
reviews.author: Cwebdog

reviews.title: "Quality Material"
reviews.text: Remodeled kitchen and needed a sink with substance on an average budget and this baby fit the description. Looks great too!
reviews.author: Em

reviews.title: "No template"
reviews.text: I was excited about this sink because of the reviews but was disappointed when I got the sink and the template was worthless. It made it hard for the granite guys to fabricate the granite by having to free-hand it. Don't bother trying to call the number given to get an updated one because it goes to an unanswered vm. Calling the general 1-800 number went to a call center in India who was supposed to email me correct template. I never got that email. Just hoping my sink will fit properly. This company left me hanging. ..thanks a lot.
reviews.author: Natalie

reviews.title: "Beautiful faucet"
reviews.text: This faucet is as great as everyone says.  So happy with it.  Transforms the kitchen and the pull-down sprayerhead has great pressure.
reviews.author: Combs

reviews.title: "Ok sink but dings quite easily"
reviews.text: Sink was great at the beginning, but after with typical use coming from a household of 4 (all adults), I noticed some ding/scratches in the sink.  These were not the typical micro-scratches I'd see, but deep one's enough for me to feel.  Most (I'd say about 75%) of the dings were from the middle divider.  It even dinged when I accidently hit a cleaver on the divider while washing it and placing it over to the other side.  I wouldn't even say it was a hard strike on the steel.  Also do note that the divider is the same height as the all around edge of the sink.This was the first stainless steel sink for us, but for the price I thought the steel would be harder than the cheaper ones, guess I was wrong on that or I just needed to get the $1k ones..You'd pretty much have to baby this sink if you want to keep it nice.
reviews.author: c3pt

reviews.title: "Great faucet for a farmhouse sink"
reviews.text: This faucet works well and extends to clean my large farmhouse sink.
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Not Happy"
reviews.text: Ordered the sink based on the false claims to be scratch resistant and prior reviews.  My contractor installed the sink and within a week, the bottom is scratched.  We only used it for a couple of items.  Since my contractor was making claims that I bought a cheap sink and they didn't cause the damage, I took a plastic fork and lightly rubbed the bottom, it scratched.  I can only imagine what it will look like the first time a pot or stainless flatware touches the surface.  The sink is already attached to my quartz countertop and I will simply have to live with it.  Not exactly how I envisioned this extremely costly remodel to go - simply settling.  I guess the grid they give you with rubber feet to protect the surface should have been my first clue.  Would have given this zero stars if that were an option.
reviews.author: Settling

reviews.title: "Don't waste your money!!"
reviews.text: I recommend you DON'T purchase this product.  After the first year the flexible hose sprang a pinhole leak that rapidly increased to a gusher underneath the sink.  Since it came with a lifetime guarantee I contacted Kraus.  They were extremely difficult but reluctantly sent a replacement.  Here I am a year later and the flexible hose suddenly sprang a leak a couple of inches above the faucet.  Within days the pinhole is now a shower.  I'm looking for a better brand that will honor their guarantee.
reviews.author: Wildcolors

reviews.title: "Beautiful Design, Poor Durability"
reviews.text: Love the modern, clean design of this sink and the features like 10" deep and 16 gauge steel with excellent soundproofing.  HOWEVER, this sink scratches and swirls very easily with typical everyday use.  MAKE SURE TO USE THE REMOVABLE GRIDS PROVIDED if you don't want your sink to look 10 years old within days of installation.  Wish I had read that tip before I started using it.  Mine was installed last week and already has scratches and swirls that I can get out with the recommended cleaning method of a scotch brite pad and Barkeeper's Friend cleaner.  VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
reviews.author: Momof3

reviews.title: "High quality"
reviews.text: I could tell this was going to be a well-made product the second I began opening the box. Even the protective bag it was packed in was impressive. I know that this is a special order item and Lowes won't have it for you to look at ahead of time, but do yourself a favor and take the chance. It is a beautiful sink. Just make sure you don't forget it is deeper than most sinks so you will have to adjust your plumbing some!
reviews.author: Rob

reviews.title: "Looks beautiful, but leaks."
reviews.text: We remodeled our kitchen, and how excited was I, after 3.5 months to FINALLY have water in my kitchen again!?!?  I started washing dishes the day it was installed, and lo and behold, we found a puddle of water under the sink.  I had the plumber back out to fix it, and he did.  However, again, more water :(After taking the brand new faucet out, something was out of whack on the inside of the faucet itself. After seeing these other reviews about leaks, I would steer clear of this faucet.  Hoping Lowes will take it back, as we no longer have the box.
reviews.author: meg

reviews.title: "Love the faucet"
reviews.text: It matches the kitchen decor and cabinet pulls. Works well and is high enough to fill lg. pots or vases.
reviews.author: Pjc

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink. Excited to put it to use."
reviews.text:
The sink arrived well-packaged and undamaged. One of only two issues so far is that to fit the sink within the minimum cabinet width, there isn't much bite on the clips. I purchased some washers to add support. The other is I'm not a huge fan of the mounting hardware. A perfect 3/8 hole with a forstner bit was too tight a fit. The little mounts crushed rather than go in. Expanding the hole led to a couple not fitting tight enough. The added supports for $5 in hardware give me peace of mind, however. Otherwise, I'm happy with the price and the included accessories. The template was cut a little unevenly, but we worked around that with sanding.  
Looking forward to years of use.
reviews.author: jwells6

reviews.title: "So far so good!"
reviews.text: I bought this sink because I wanted a big, deep sink for my family size. We do a lot cooking and dishes and this is perfect! It looks beautiful and I was a little worried going from 2 drains to 1 but it works great with a garbage disposal. The only issue I had was during install because the garbage disposal comes in a different texture of stainless steel so I needed to buy a different drain that matches.
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Very disappointed"
reviews.text: I had it for 3 days in which time I probably washed 2-3 plates and cups. There is already rust on it.  All my life I used stainless sinks.  I never even knew sinks can rust with such light use.  Water stain and losing shine I can understand but rusting after 3 days is just not acceptable.  I would return the product if it weren't so troublesome to uninstall this and install a new one.  Unless you are planning on leaving no dishes ever in the sink and wiping the sink completely dry, not even a little bit of moist on, after each use whether it's finding out a cup or washing hand, this won't work.
reviews.author: Dontbuyit

reviews.title: "Piece of art"
reviews.text: This fauctet is quite stunning. Ours is the Stainless Steel version. Matches the sink perfectly.
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "Everything we wanted!"
reviews.text: We have had so many complements on our faucet! It's is super chic and totally completes our kitchen. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Laura

reviews.title: "Very Impressed!"
reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered this faucet because it didn't have very many reviews. Thankfully, I have been very impressed with his faucet. It is packaged extremely well and comes with everything you need to install, other than hand tools. We had it installed in less than 15 minutes! It took longer to pull everything out from under the counter, than it did to install. It is very heavy, and seems to be made very well. It even has under-the-sink adjustments that allows it to be plumbed and squared quickly. It looks great with my farmhouse sink and has amazing water pressure as well! Our last faucet only lasted about 2 years, so we are hoping for many years of service from this one.
reviews.author: robinandmarty

reviews.title: "Rustic Faucet"
reviews.text: Added this brushed bronze faucet to our new kitchen and it is perfect! It was easy to instal and it works great.
reviews.author: Kitchendemo

reviews.title: "Awesome sink"
reviews.text: I wanted large, deep and no rounded edges (so I have more usable room).  This runs circles around our older sink.  We wanted an undermount, plus more room for larger pots.  WE GOT IT.  You can also, as my wife is sometimes inclined, stack a full days dirties, and no one will see them, due to the depth. The sink cleans up well, looks professional, and we are very happy with it.  The greatest downside is the almost flat bottom.  It is more difficult to rinse out and get all the debris down the drain or to the disposal.  The build quality is excellent.  I much prefer welded construction to pressed steel and it screams quality. It is also well insulated (quiet).  I would highly recommend this sink to anyone who would put quality, workmanship, practicality and size over a more stylish (in some peoples opinion) sink. I love it.  We do not use the bottom racks as they do not seem to add any improvement to an already fine sink. We also did not install the deep strainer basket, as we find the standard one more than adequate.
reviews.author: Downhiller

reviews.title: "Love Love!!!"
reviews.text: I bought this faucet along with my Kraus sink when I was updating my kitchen. I absolutely love this faucet. Very easy to use and simple. It has a magnetic catch for your faucet which I love. It looks so good in my kitchen and you will not be disappointed!!!
reviews.author: Jaxsongirl

reviews.title: "Kraus 32" sink"
reviews.text: Wow amazing! Packed great, compare to others what  a deal. Don't hesitate to buy this one... I love it, This is the centerpiece of our kitchen - a real work of art!
reviews.author: Sam

reviews.title: "Very well made, solid"
reviews.text: This is a solid, high quality faucet.  looks great.  Works great.
reviews.author: Franko

reviews.title: "Gorgeous Finish - Easy Install"
reviews.text: My husband installed this in a matter of minutes.  Looks gorgeous.  Hoping not to have any of the leaking problems as others have had.  It really adds to finish since I don't have your typical window behind the sink.  It gives a focal point to an otherwise blah wall.
reviews.author: Binx

reviews.title: "Great kitchen faucet"
reviews.text: I wanted a pull down kitchen faucet, but not one that would have issues with the mechanism for returning the sprayer to its resting position.  This works like a charm, and the sprayer hose is silver so it does not look as industrial as the black ones.
reviews.author: CanucKY

reviews.title: "Kraus Bolden Kitchen faucet - great style!"
reviews.text: We selected the Kraus Bolden kitchen faucet because we wanted a commercial-style faucet that would fit in our residential kitchen. This quality product fits the bill! The 18" height is perfect! A very practical and lovely faucet. I highly recommend.
reviews.author: auntmike9953

reviews.title: "Good Item"
reviews.text: Great construction sink. Both sides are huge even though it is a 60/40 and the 10 inch depth is a plus. Not sure about durability as it is not installed yet but arrived perfectly with no spots, dings, etc.
reviews.author: Amaury

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink"
reviews.text: The sink was simple to order online at Lowes.com and arrived at my local Lowe's sooner than expected. It was packaged very well and was in pristine condition. It is a little bit harder to clean than I would have liked. This may be due to the large size, and it not being sloped as much as I expected, but I still love the look and the overall quality.
reviews.author: Gail

reviews.title: "Sink of our dreams!"
reviews.text: We couldn't be happier! The 30 in model was a perfect fit as our countertops were slightly more narrow, but it didn't jeopardize size and use. The single basin is ideal for cleaning those big pots and pans and the metal grate on the bottom continues to live in our sink as it helps with water/waste flow. Also the 16 gauge means it's quiet! The fact it doesn't have pre-drilled faucet/dispenser holes means you can have more flexibility in what accessories to buy which ended up being a huge benefit. Again totally love it, would recommend to anyone looking for an undermount sink.
reviews.author: Mkscho

reviews.title: "Classy looking fsucet"
reviews.text: Very well packed, easy to install. Looks great in my new kitchen, comes with water lines. This is not a pull out faucet, but the flexible hose has enough reach to rinse all the corners of my sink. Good water pressure, actually splashes a bit onto my counter if I'm not careful.
reviews.author: Monk

reviews.title: "Kraus faucet"
reviews.text: This is beautiful faucet, looks like more expensive version, easy to install on our granite, and looks great with our double bowl farm sink
reviews.author: T

reviews.title: "Best Faucet Ever"
reviews.text: This thing is the best. I use it all of the time and it goes so beautifully with my Kraus Sink and black granite.
reviews.author: Christopher

reviews.title: "Super Classy Sink!"
reviews.text: We replaced our cast iron double vanity sink for this super sized single when we remodeled our kitchen. We went with under-mount because we replaced the Granite. We couldn't be happier with our purchase. This sink is overall wide and deep, just what we wanted. The grate that comes with it is really nice too. We paired it with the Kraus KPF-1610 faucet. This combination is great. The garbage disposal mounted to it with ease. We liked this sink so much, we ordered a smaller one for our laundry room. I highly recommend Kraus for the quality, looks, and practicality.
reviews.author: BobbyTX

reviews.title: "Quality faucet, great finish"
reviews.text: Solid construction and finish looks very high end (matte black). Packaging is great too!
reviews.author: Jon

reviews.title: "beautiful sink"
reviews.text: We love the sink! It's big it's sturdy and it looks very classy. We highly recommend
reviews.author: emily

reviews.title: "Broke after only 4 months"
reviews.text: Had complete kitchen remodel. This faucet was brand new and professionally installed. Four months later, water is spraying everywhere under my new sink cabinet. Turns out the faucet was faulty and the pull down tubing under the sink was leaking.
reviews.author: debra

reviews.title: "Kitchen redone!"
reviews.text: Great sink and better quality than anything even more pricey than this little beauty!  Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Kee

reviews.title: "New faucet"
reviews.text: I replaced a delta faucet with this one and couldn't be happier
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Great Sink W/Great Price!!"
reviews.text: We were hesitate at getting a stainless sink as they require regular maintenance to keep looking nice and the noise they make when items are dropped in. We are glad we did and glad we have this one. the quality is amazing and the sound deadening material works great.The only problem we have with it is how do we remove scratched that come up. I have yet to find a solution that KRAUS is ok with. We use one of the recommended cleaners for the sink and the sink looks great afterwards. If i needed to i would definitely purchase this sink again.
reviews.author: Cris

reviews.title: "Stopped working"
reviews.text: I loved this faucet, great for rinsing highchair trays and everything else. Unfortunately, we have owned it for only a year and the handle made a popping noise and now barely any water will come out of it. The handle can't be removed so I don't believe it can be fixed and we will need to replace.
reviews.author: KK

reviews.title: "Dual spray??"
reviews.text: The information tab shows a spread spray, but the Kpf-2230-sn has a straight spray. I chose Kraus over Moen because Of the illustration. Should have chose Moen.
reviews.author: Donna

reviews.title: "Fits everything but ..."
reviews.text: We've had this sink just about 6 months. We call it the kitchen bathtub because it's wonderfully large and deep - so easy to wash baking sheets and oversize pots. I agree with other posts that it scratches incredibly easily (and I'm not impressed by the company response that the scratches will even out as the sink gets more scratches. Because of the rack, it scratches most when a knife or fork gets stuck, so they're really gouges more than scratches from the normal wear and tear of our old SS sink. Still love it and would buy it again.
reviews.author: MK

reviews.title: "LOVE this sink!!"
reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with this sink purchase. It's beautifully designed and I especially love the extra depth. The grate is a nice touch - it's helpful not only for keeping the bottom from scratching, but also for example when you need to drain a large pot without getting other things you have in there wet. I worried about some reviews about debris not draining well because the bottom is too flat, but I found a good system to work around it - just blast the spray faucet at the tops of the four corners just below the countertop, and everything gets washed down the drain quickly and easily. The strainer is easy to pull out with the grate still in place and the grate is easy to lift up on one side to give a quick soapy wipe-down to keep bottom sanitized.
reviews.author: soyo

reviews.title: "Slow Drain"
reviews.text: We have owned for 8 months.  We like the look.  The bottom is so flat water stands in bottom and drains slow.  Very hard to wash items down drain.  The metal is a little thin and scratches easily.  Must use rack to protect bottom.  I read today the concerns about rust.  We have no rust but I do understand it may happen with the standing water and thin skin.  I will need to call on the warranty if that occurs.  We like the look.
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "I thought high end.... NOT!"
reviews.text: The head on this faucet is plastic...... need I say more. Junk!
reviews.author: Tab

reviews.title: "super elegant faucet!"
reviews.text: I purchased this faucet 3 years ago and worked GREAT. Functional, easy to clean, and so good looking with my soapstone sink. Then it started leaking under the sink. I called the company and they sent me a replacement AT NO COST! That is awesome customer service! Could not be happier!
reviews.author: Maria

reviews.title: "KrUs SS sink"
reviews.text: This product is very well made and should provide years of good service. My one negative is that there was no alternative as to the depth of the sink. Although the new norm seems to be 10” I would have preferred around 8” in depth due to the available space under my counter.
reviews.author: Rich

reviews.title: "Used as drop in."
reviews.text: Love the style and the thickness. Placed a couple dishes the first day without the rack and it easily got marks. Not sure if thats normal on stainless steel. Having the rack is amazing and the amount of pots I can place at the same time is excellent. Totally recommended.
reviews.author: Jericho

reviews.title: "Who thought a sink could be awesome?"
reviews.text: I waited a long time to buy this sink after months of research and debating.  It was worth it.  I never thought I could get excited about a sink.  I can wash all sizes of pots, pans, roaster, cookie sheets, etc.  and it is deep enough to accommodate even my tall pasta pot! The strainer basket is superior to any other and eliminates the potential for food scraps to go down the drain. Oh and the best is the whisper quiet when you run water.  If you don't have this sink you don't know what you are missing.
reviews.author: GrandmaJan

reviews.title: "Love My Faucet!"
reviews.text: I'd never heard of Kraus but based on internet reviews I decided to buy this faucet. I love it! It goes well with my black granite countertops and black composite sink. It feels like a quality faucet and I'll be purchasing more for my bathrooms as I remodel them.
reviews.author: Mjshea

reviews.title: "Great purchase"
reviews.text: Could not be happier.  Faucet functions great.  Easy to spray entire 30" sink.  Good pressure and easy to use.  Much easier to install than a faucet with a hose that goes under the sink.  Attractive addition and not overpowering.
reviews.author: Billie

reviews.title: "Awesome!!!"
reviews.text: My wife picked out this sink and I was kind of like...”oh well!”  - this is a really bad —ss sink!  Love it!
reviews.author: D

reviews.title: "Classic look for a great price"
reviews.text: Love the oil rubbed finish. Easy installation and deck plate included covered the previous 3 holes I had before. You can do one hole installation also. Installing was easy
reviews.author: Sandy

reviews.title: "Beautiful Design"
reviews.text: The chrome and stainless steel combo was a perfect match in my kitchen. It works great. Pressure is decent. And it was an instant upgrade to the kitchen.
reviews.author: Tam

reviews.title: "Nice faucet, easy to install, works and looks grea"
reviews.text: Never had a Kraus, but Delta and Moen didn't have exactly what I wanted. Took a chance with a name I didn't know and it's worked out well.
reviews.author: William

reviews.title: "The best sing money can buy"
reviews.text:
Upon arrival of this sink I was extremely impressed with the quality.  the difference between 16 gauge and 18 gauge is amazing.  Really well insulated so that it sounds like cast iron, not steel.

The sink also comes with a rack that is supplied with the sink, We love the look of the undermount installation.  Very clean and upscale.  The strainer basket is also of first quality.  No plastic here.

I would recommend this product to anyone planning to upgrade their sink.
reviews.author: srdjeep

reviews.title: "Junk. It broke in less than 2 weeks"
reviews.text: This has been installed for about 12 days and already it's broken. The spray attachment won't stay in the gripper. It just drops and swings loose. For this much money, that's infuriating.
reviews.author: Nan

reviews.title: "Best sink on market"
reviews.text: Purchased sink for bar area as I already own one as prep sink. Strudy and easy to clean. Grate at
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "Nice sink"
reviews.text: Sink is deep and easy to keep clean. Love my new sink
reviews.author: Lori

reviews.title: "Nice Upgrade"
reviews.text: Previous sink came with the old kitchen. When we upgraded the kitchen there were a few things that were must haves for me. 1. Needed to be deep2. Needed to be large3. Double - basinThe size and depth allows for a lot of items to be kept in the sink and not appear to be piled up. But most important for me was keeping the mess to a minimum. Our previous shallow sink had a lot of water splash back on to the counters. That is all but eliminated now. I prefer a dual-basin because it allows us to have one side exclusive for a garbage disposal. I like that it is smaller than the other side even if only slightly smaller (60/40). Appears to be durable and a good look for what we were going for. I also like that it comes with the additional features like the floor grates. Small thing but saves some money from having to purchase them. Really enjoying this sink.
reviews.author: rahrah12

reviews.title: "Awesome Faucet"
reviews.text: This faucet makes my kitchen sink look so professional.  The water sprays are so smooth & I love the flow of water that I get from it.  So many of my friends have asked where I got it & have also ordered one for themselves. I love that it has only one handle.
reviews.author: alice

reviews.title: "Love!"
reviews.text: So far we love this sink! It is massive. We've had it installed for about three months now. I think the main/only downfall so far for us, is if you don't wipe it down with the cleaning cloth after it's been exposed to water....it will leave water spots everywhere. Which can be annoying...but still love the sink otherwise! We had it installed with our new countertops, and all the contractors loved it too.
reviews.author: diyer

reviews.title: "All In ONE Sink"
reviews.text: This is our third Kraus under-mount kitchen sink.  We used two in our Chef designed kitchen of our primary home, but time to sell and move on.  Therefore, we wish to have the same quality in our current home as we put our own stamp on it.  The size, metal thickness, and cook pot depth make this Kraus sink the stainless steel standard.  Buy one and you will never look back.
reviews.author: MajorBS

reviews.title: "High Quality Sink"
reviews.text: I am so glad a purchased this sink.  I researched many different brands and this is by far the best quality I have found for the price.  I absolutely love the size and thickness.  It is very quiet and the rack at the bottom is a wonderful bonus to help protect it from scratching.  You can not go wrong with this sink!  I would highly recommend it!
reviews.author: Stuffel

reviews.title: "Faucet pretty, not too functional"
reviews.text: I had this faucet installed in July 2018.  The spray hose has never once stayed in the holder.  when you turn the water off, the spray pops out of the holder and you have to put it back in.  Today, January 2019, the handle (hot cold part) completely just fell off.  Now, I get compliments on this handle but would prefer to be able to use it.
reviews.author: Lisa

reviews.title: "The item was defective"
reviews.text: The item was defective, it has a problem with water flow. Plumber told us to return and get only delta...
reviews.author: Wanda

reviews.title: "Beautiful!"
reviews.text: The sink is beautiful!  I love the depth which gives me the ability to wash large pans with ease and still have room to rinse them.  I look forward to years of washing dishes in this sink - and I don't really enjoy washing dishes!!!  My husband as well loves the depth.  He chaffs at dish washing when the sink is too shallow!
reviews.author: Pepper

reviews.title: "Fantastic Sink!"
reviews.text: This sink is Beautiful! (It's also perfectly designed, functional and quiet)  I had it installed in a nice granite counter top and it stands out as the feature!  I'm impressed with the quality of material and craftsmanship and the ease of installation.  I can't wait to wash something in it ... right now I'm just admiring it.
reviews.author: Rdrnr48

reviews.title: "Just what I was looking for"
reviews.text: We haven't installed it yet but it's exactly what I was looking for. The size is great. I like that one size is smaller than the other yet it's still a rectangular sink.
reviews.author: MommaB

reviews.title: "Beautiful in the box but poor quality"
reviews.text: This sink was exactly what we were looking for and with the 16 gauge stainless we thought it would hold up well.  It looked beautiful in the box but once it was installed the bottom was scratched after the first use.   We only washed two pans in it and the bottom was completely scratched.   Don't buy this product!!
reviews.author: J

reviews.title: "High Quality Sink"
reviews.text: I just received my Kraus sink I purchased from Home Depot. Packaging was superb! It was wrapped in a scratch proof bag and came with high quality accessories. I haven't installed it yet but it seems like it was made very well and very sturdy. You can't go wrong with a purchase that comes with a lifetime warranty!
reviews.author: BDC

reviews.title: "Plenty of room"
reviews.text: Hey this is a great sink. Lots of space. Flat bottom. Deep. Sound is not that tinny cheap sink sound. It's quite smooth. Works well with garbage disposal. Now the only issue I have is that it does not fully drain well. Meaning there can be standing water after you are done in the sink. Meh, still awesome. Enjoy.
reviews.author: Sink_Lover

reviews.title: "Beautiful Sink"
reviews.text: It took over 6 weeks to finally have new sink installed due to waiting installation of new countertops. I absolutely love this sink. It looks gorgeous and all my cooking and baking pans fit inside easily. I can't wait until canning season begins in order to fit my large canner into sink for easy cleaning.
reviews.author: Sandy

reviews.title: "My Favorite"
reviews.text: After researching several stainless steel sinks I purchased three and did a side by side comparison. I decided on the Kraus because of the sound proofing, weight, color, appearance and quality of the stainless steel. I installed a garbage disposal and I have had no problem with draining angle.
reviews.author: Wayde

reviews.title: "Highly recommended"
reviews.text: We are updating our kitchen counters and decided to upgrade our sink and faucet as well. After many hours of reading reviews and manufacturer material, I decided to go with the Kraus. She's a beaut, 16 ga. steel and 80% soundproffing = win/win. I will write a follow up review with pictures.
reviews.author: wsm73

reviews.title: "Great Looking Sink"
reviews.text: Has not been installed as yet but the look of the sink is by far a lot nicer than many other sinks found at the bigger box stores.  Did quite an exhaustive search looking for the single bowl basin and really like the strainer basket as an added feature along with the bottom grid.
reviews.author: DJMAC

reviews.title: "Nice Sink"
reviews.text: This sink appears to be a quality product, have not installed yet. Packaging was the best. I also ordered a faucet from the same company, hopefully it will be a quality product as well, have not received it yet. Liked the reviews for this company compared to their competition.
reviews.author: RMN

reviews.title: "Unbelievable Quality & Beauty"
reviews.text: I put a Kraus sink in my old house years ago, and loved it.  Just did a kitchen remodel on my current house, and bought this one.  Their quality is amazing, and pretty too.  Deep sinks are awesome for dinner parties too.  My friends just bought one after they saw mine.
reviews.author: hooleywood

reviews.title: "LOVE THIS SINK!"
reviews.text: Going on 6 months of heavy use and I can't say enough about this sink. Perfect size, love the flush undermount. Grate in bottom is really convenient. basket strainer great when cleaning up, doesn't stop up as easily as my old strainers. Wish I had upgraded long ago!
reviews.author: Catladi

reviews.title: "Beautiful"
reviews.text: I love this sink. It's huge and gorgeous. It's nice that it comes with a grate because though are expensive on their own. It scratched already but I know that over time the scratches will come together for a brushed look and it's a sink so its bound to happen.
reviews.author: Mika

reviews.title: "Amazing sink, some scratches"
reviews.text: Fast shipping, from amazon. The sink is absolutely amazing, wide, long and shines really well. It did came with a few scratches on the bottom, I thought it was supposed to be stainless steel and scratch resistant. I am going to reach out to the manufacturer
reviews.author: Gantoine

reviews.title: "Love My Sink"
reviews.text: I love everything about my new sink, great size, love the depth since it is big enough to fit a sink drainer rack over the top and still have plenty of useable sink space. However, it has developed tiny rust spots after only a month of use, no idea how.
reviews.author: KBZ

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink"
reviews.text: I replaced a builder quality SS single bowl sink in my home with this sink and it is a definite improvement. It is much more sturdy, well built, and attention to detail is there. You can even see it in the way it is packaged and shipped. Very impressed!
reviews.author: kmook

reviews.title: "High Quality Sink, Definitely Worth the Price"
reviews.text: The sink came package well and no scratches or dings.  It looks great and with the depth makes it great for cleaning large items.  We also got the optional Over the Sink Multipurpose Roll-up Dish Drying Rack, which is very convenient.
reviews.author: PaulB

reviews.title: "Beautiful Sink!"
reviews.text: I am very excited about my new sink. It is a perfect size to wash large pots and pans and looks great! Definitely happy with the grate that came with it, best thing to have.  Had this installed when the new countertops went in.
reviews.author: Jessica2012

reviews.title: "Love this faucet"
reviews.text: It's a great faucet but would work better for through counter top.  I put it in a stainless tub sink and it causes the sink to flex a bit when you manipulate the fixture.  Wouldn't have the same issue going through a counter top.
reviews.author: Geoff

reviews.title: "Great Sink!!"
reviews.text: I wasn't looking for a stainless sink, but this looked very good.  We went with it and couldn't be happier.  It just feels really solid and well made.  It has an elegant but industrial look to it.  You won't be disappointed!!
reviews.author: Yeags01

reviews.title: "Wonderful product"
reviews.text: Hi I feel the product was perfectly as per costed. I didnt feel it was an lesser or over priced. And the quality of the product satisfied me very well. Best thing is all the small appliances required were included with it.
reviews.author: Vinay

reviews.title: "Beautiful Sink"
reviews.text: This sink was absolutely beautiful. It has a gorgeous finish which looks beautiful in my new kitchen. I also like the depth of the sink on both sides. This is helpful for filling and washing large pots. Love this sink !
reviews.author: Mary

reviews.title: "High quality sink"
reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with my purchase.  The sink is sleek, quiet, and I especially appreciate the sink depth. So easy to hand wash larger pots and pans.   Much prefer single bowl after having used double bowls for years.
reviews.author: Poco66

reviews.title: "HIGH QUALITY SINK & FAUCET"
reviews.text: We have only had our new sink and new faucet one week, but we love it!!  I did a fair amount of research before ordering!  We are completely thrilled with the look, the quality and the beauty it adds to our kitchen!!
reviews.author: Bum

reviews.title: "Beautiful design and function"
reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my new Kraus sink. It's size, depth, and design are everything I wanted. It was shipped in very secure packaging, without damage. I can't say enough about the quality and value of this sink!
reviews.author: ekay

reviews.title: "Tight radius corners"
reviews.text: Sink was of good quality but was returned as my wife thought the sink corners were of too tight a radius to be easily cleaned. Ordered another sink sith wider radius corners. Lows made the exchange with no problems.
reviews.author: MikeB

reviews.title: "32" SS Sink"
reviews.text: We just finished remodeling our kitchen and our big and deep Kraus sink is beautiful. An excellent quality unit installed undermount easily. To our surprise the sink came with a stainless grate, a great extra value.
reviews.author: Amprosman

reviews.title: "Great look for our updated kitchen"
reviews.text: We had such a hard time deciding between the 32inch and the 30inch, but after much debating and consulting with friends and family we finally decided to go with the 32inch. So glad we did. We absolutely love it.
reviews.author: Nashvillehusker1

reviews.title: "Nice sink but not good for short people"
reviews.text: This sink is attractive and good quality, but as other reviews noted water tends to not drain completely. Also as someone that is only 5'2" I find that the deeper bowl makes it harder to wash dishes comfortably.
reviews.author: Tina

reviews.title: "Excellent sink!"
reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the quality of this sink - it is beautiful, came very well packaged and seems equal in quality to a much more expensive sink I put into my last kitchen.  Very happy with this purchase.
reviews.author: KKD

reviews.title: "The Sink Dreams are Made of!"
reviews.text: Just installed the sink a few days ago and it is absolutely beautiful! I could skip doing dishes for days and no one would notice because the sink is so deep and large you would not be able to see them!
reviews.author: Miss Otto

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Steven

reviews.title: "Great sink in hard to find size"
reviews.text: Lovely sink with deep basket  strainer in the one I purchased. A few reviews talking about “rust” had me find online not to use hand sanitizer chemicals around stainless sink. 5 stars for me
reviews.author: Puzzler

reviews.title: "Fine Looking, Slow Draining"
reviews.text: Love the idea of this sink. Looks great. However, water pools uniformly across the bottom of the sink. Also, while I love the functional grid, food particles adhere to it. Pain in the butt.
reviews.author: semicolon1

reviews.title: "Great products"
reviews.text:
Love the size.  Drains well.  Use with a side dish drain. 
Use with a garbage disposal. Have a question about how to keep protective grid clean.  Rubber pads on grid keep from scratching.
reviews.author: Barry

reviews.title: "Not yet installed"
reviews.text: We are building a new home and the sink is not yet installed.  There were such great review felt I couldn't go wrong.  Will follow up later after we have it installed and are using it.
reviews.author: Swanlady

reviews.title: "Sleek Sink"
reviews.text: Very industrial looking but functional. Perfect for washing large pots and pans. Love  the grate attachment for drainage.  Only issue is it did not come with disposal attachments.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "good quality sink"
reviews.text: It is a professional style sink. I am very satisfied with its' dimension. It is big enough to wash large pots. I like its' clean and contemporary design. stylish and good quality!
reviews.author: Michelle

reviews.title: "If it fits buy it!"
reviews.text: Nice heavy duty construction thick walls. Looked at others just felt flimsy. Have not mounted it yet but overall I am impressed. Cant wait to install it.
reviews.author: Ry

reviews.title: "Deep and wide and easy to clean"
reviews.text: Excellent product -- it comes with a bottom strainer that makes cleaning dishes and vegetables neat and easy.  Large capacity for big stockpots is a huge benefit.  Love it!
reviews.author: Carpiodiem

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink"
reviews.text: Just had this installed yesterday and it is beautiful.  Just what I wanted...a big deep single modern stainless sink.  Love that it came with the bottom rack.  Great buy.
reviews.author: lamb923

reviews.title: "Finishing Touch"
reviews.text: A very high quality sink that completed our countertop upgrade. It looks great with out Titanium granite. We will never purchase anything other than Kraus for our homes.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "Beautiful Sink"
reviews.text: Bought this sink for my laundry room. It arrived well packed, and even in its own cloth bag to ensure that there were no scratches. Look forward to having it installed.
reviews.author: Lane

reviews.title: "Just what we wanted"
reviews.text: Can only speak of the appearance, short term quality and functionality since we have only had it for a week, but it really seems like a great product.  Seems well made.
reviews.author: Megster

reviews.title: "beautiful sink"
reviews.text: great sink with a very nice strainer system, comes with a great perfect fitting rack to protect the sink bottom. easy to clean couldnt be more happy with this product
reviews.author: tribetime

reviews.title: "great sink"
reviews.text: I love this sink, especially the grate to protect the bottom from scratches.  It is so big that I can now wash all my big pans.I would recommend this sink to anyone.
reviews.author: rob

reviews.text: I haven't had my sink installed yet, but I was very happy with how quickly it arrived.  Once I have it installed and use it for a few weeks I'll post another review.
reviews.author: Carolyn

reviews.title: "Krause kitchen sink."
reviews.text: Great sink. Heavy grade steel. Much less than a well known competitor
reviews.author: MECBoston

reviews.title: "Exactly What We Wanted"
reviews.text: New countertops and this was exactly what we were looking for as it has great construction, is deep enough and looks perfect in our new kitchen! I would recommend!
reviews.author: Paula

reviews.title: "Excellent quality sink"
reviews.text: I absolutely love this sink, the quality is everything I looked for in a sink. My sister saw my new sink and she bought one too! The design is beautiful too !!!
reviews.author: Socalgal

reviews.text: Sink came well packaged with no issues and great price. Have yet to install it (reason for 4 stars) but can't wait since it's exactly what we were looking for.
reviews.author: Tonya

reviews.title: "Krause pull down"
reviews.text: I've just recently installed my kraus which was super easy to do and it blends in so well with the rest of my mid century modern furniture and decor.  Love it.
reviews.author: Tim

reviews.title: "Excellent Quality"
reviews.text: Beautifully-made sink - large and excellent quality. My husband is a plumber and he was very pleased with the installation process and high quality product.
reviews.author: Kristy

reviews.title: "Nice sink!"
reviews.text: The sink is very well-made and looks great. I know some sinks come with a matching faucet, but this one doesn't. That's the only reason for losing a star.
reviews.author: Sarah

reviews.title: "Nice product"
reviews.text: I love the way to look in my island so far great product from the beginig i have little rust spots but have off with softscrub and don't return anymore
reviews.author: Aldo

reviews.title: "Great sink for a new construction."
reviews.text: Love the Kraus stainless steel single sink.  I will never go back to a double sink!   The size is perfect for soaking and washing large pots and pans.
reviews.author: Linda

reviews.title: "Kraus Bolden Stainless Steel 1-Handle Pull-down K"
reviews.text: Very happy with this faucet. It is worth the cost, and uses higher quality rings and seals to prevent failure in the future. Was very easy to install.
reviews.author: Ray

reviews.title: "Love This Sink!"
reviews.text: This sink looks perfect in our brand new kitchen! It is very wide and deep, and I love that it comes with a tray to protect the bottom of the sink.
reviews.author: starbrit12

reviews.title: "Sink"
reviews.text: It's a beautiful sink and does the job. Much bigger than I realized. It's brand new so no complaints so far. Will update if anything changes.
reviews.author: Katie

reviews.title: "Awesome sink"
reviews.text: I am so in love with my Kraus sink!!!  I looks gorgeous, is so big and handles all my giant pots!  I highly recommend this sink!!  Love it!!
reviews.author: Barb0924

reviews.title: "5 Star faucet"
reviews.text: Excellent faucet for commercial utility sinksEasy to install.We install it 3 months ago in nail salon. With heavy use, working perfectly
reviews.author: Aplex

reviews.title: "Nice big sink."
reviews.text: The sink is strong, quiet and big. I didn't need the drain to come with it since I have garbage disposal. I would have rather paid less.
reviews.author: Jeff

reviews.title: "Awesome stainless steel sink"
reviews.text: Well made sink with 16 ga steel...the soundproofing is better than any other sink we've had...the drain with basket is a nice addition!
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Fantastic Sink"
reviews.text: I love this sink - it is so nice and heavy and easy to clean - you can tell it is top quality.  I have received many compliments on it.
reviews.author: Linnea

reviews.title: "Quick Turnaround, solid product"
reviews.text: No complaints, picked up from the store in good condition. Now waiting for new countertops to install the piece, but satisfied so far!
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "Beautiful faucet"
reviews.text: Not only is this faucet gorgeous but so well made and fits my needs perfectly.  Looks great with my white farmhouse sink too.
reviews.author: Cindy

reviews.title: "High Quality Stainless Steel Sink"
reviews.text: Very pleased with this sink purchased at Lowe's.  High quality stainless steel, durable, and looks good. Would recommend.
reviews.author: Marty

reviews.title: "Wonderful sink!"
reviews.text: Loving this sink!  The size is great for washing any size pots and having plenty of room to do so.  Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Jen

reviews.title: "Love it"
reviews.text: I love this new sink! Nice and deep/large for large pots and pans!  Make my newly remolded kitchen look up to date!
reviews.author: Natasha

reviews.title: "Island Sink"
reviews.text: I purchased it for my kitchen island.  Heavy sink.  Looks as pictured.  Looking forward to putting it to good use!!
reviews.author: TGIrl

reviews.title: "Best bang for your buck"
reviews.text: This is the best quality sink that you will find anywhere for the price. Not to mention it is absolutely stunning.
reviews.author: Pebbles

reviews.title: "I have purchased two now ..."
reviews.text: Love this sink  and fixture. Looks great /works great. Awesome as a chef to have a big sink for big pots and pans.
reviews.author: Kstill29

reviews.title: "Kraus Bolden SS faucetr"
reviews.text: beautiful faucet---works great and looks awesome----replaced a 3-yr old Kohler that started leaking after 3-years
reviews.author: De

reviews.title: "Great sink!"
reviews.text: I'm so pleased with my purchase of the Kraus undermount sink. It's solid construction  was especially appealing.
reviews.author: les

reviews.title: "Great quality sink."
reviews.text: Beautiful sink, nice, large and shiny. Love the sink rack.  Great quality. Great addition to our new kitchen!
reviews.author: Jimmy

reviews.title: "great product & good prcing"
reviews.text: I cant say anymore at this time because we haven't move into our new home but feel good our our choice!
reviews.author: PST4NU

reviews.title: "great sink"
reviews.text: Nice sink - Thick walled and one of the deepest I could find - we are using this in our laundry room.
reviews.author: mwmwmwm

reviews.title: "This sink rocks!"
reviews.text: This sink is literally perfect! It is very spacious and i feel like i can get anything done with it!
reviews.author: BarbaraGKhan

reviews.title: "SS undermount kitchen sink, faucet, dispenser"
reviews.text: HIGH QUALITY AND COMPETITIVELY PRICED, JUST INSTALLED YESTERDAY SO WILL SEE PERFORMANCE OVER TIME.
reviews.author: BLC

reviews.title: "Stainless steel sink"
reviews.text: Love this sink, it is beautiful. Gorgeous clean lines. Easy to clean and stays looking like new.
reviews.author: Vicki

reviews.title: "Sink"
reviews.text: I am satisfied with my purchase of this sink for the quality of the material and craftsmanship
reviews.author: Louie

reviews.title: "High Quality Sink"
reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my new Kraus sink and would definitely buy a Kraus product again.
reviews.author: caleb

reviews.title: "Beautiful but don't like the plastic basket staine base"
reviews.text: Very nice design but the part brake easy... the plastic base of the basket strainer broke
reviews.author: CamyG

reviews.title: "Well made sink!"
reviews.text: Very well made sink, looks and functions awesome. Drainage not an issue, love it so far.
reviews.author: Lukez

reviews.title: "high quality sink"
reviews.text: The sink is very heavy, it really looks good and the quality of the sink is very good.
reviews.author: teray

reviews.title: "Perfect for a small space"
reviews.text: This is our second Kraus stainless sink. Excellence & quality for a great price point
reviews.author: S

reviews.title: "kitchen sink"
reviews.text: Heavy 16 gauge metal with sound proof coating makes my old sink look like a tin can.
reviews.author: Forrest

reviews.title: "Quality and value"
reviews.text: Quality sink that came in perfect condition in a very nice shipping bag and box.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Beautiful sink and faucet"
reviews.text: Very happy with the large size of this sink and the way the new faucet operates
reviews.author: Richard

reviews.title: "Looks great"
reviews.text: The feel and looks make this a very kitchen must have without breaking the bank
reviews.author: Bg

reviews.title: "amazing sink"
reviews.text: Love this sink. My husband installed it easily in 1 night. Best purchase ever!
reviews.author: sara

reviews.title: "High quality, huge facuet, looks great."
reviews.text: I am highly satisfied with this sink and faucet.  Looks great, great price.
reviews.author: McCoybe55

reviews.title: "Solid Construction"
reviews.text: Top quality. No fear of denting. Looks great and great update to kitchen.
reviews.author: JoeBoston

reviews.text: It's beautiful for a sink, prompt and extremely will packed for delivery
reviews.author: Lorie

reviews.title: "So Besutiful!"
reviews.text: I love everything about this sink. Easy to install and easy on the eyes.
reviews.author: Teabee

reviews.title: "Exceptional quality and very well described"
reviews.text: The sink is strong, well insulated and manufactured with high standards.

reviews.author: Robert

reviews.title: "Beautifully Functional All-In-One Sink"
reviews.text:
We're currently in the middle of a DIY kitchen renovation and decided to switch from the typical 90's builder-grade two-bowl stainless steel to a single-bowl undermount sink.  After doing a bit of research, we came across the Kraus brand.  While we hadn't ever heard of the brand, the reviews on literally every one of their products (basically 4.9 *'s) were undeniable.  We decided to give Kraus a shot and are SO glad we did.

Pros:
- Huge profile - almost to the point that we wished we'd gone with a 28" sink.
- Deep bowl
- Clean lines
- Installation instructions are clear and straightforward; will take some planning for each customer's specific application
- High-grade stainless steel w/ noise dampeners (silverware "thuds" when dropped into the sink rather than the annoying "clanging")

Cons:
- Mounting hardware can interfere w/ top of base cabinet even if cabinet meets minimum width/depth specs (our cabinet was 33 1/2" wide).  Ours did, so we simply notched out the top of the base cabinet where there was interference
- Holes specified for mounting hardware were too small for the actual plastic "female" pieces; we adapted by chamfering the starts of the holes so the pieces could get started

Overall, beautiful product, and we're excited for it to be a focal point of our kitchen for years to come!
reviews.author: jcrist30

reviews.title: "Amazing! A sink for a lifetime of worry-free use."
reviews.text: This sink is hands down the most superior in quality I have ever seen, installed or had the pleasure to use. I have been in the luxury and fine home-building industry for almost two decades and this sink is one of the best I have ever had the pleaseure to install. And, lucky me, I get to actually use this one on a daily basis in my own home! I have always been a stickler for a deep sink. But usually having a deep sink means that you get noise that could easily rival that of Niagara Falls when the faucet is running. Kraus knows that and solved that problem with their under-sink dampening system. THAT feature alone has me sold! The accessories Kraus included don't hurt either. But on to the most important "perk" that Kraus included..... The drain kit! Be still my beating heart... Why is this so important you ask? Keeping in mind that a large percentage of consumer end kitchen sinks do NOT come with a drain kit. This leaves the installer, contractor or even the occasional DIY'er with only a few options... Option 1: they call up the manufacturer of the sink they purchased, without a drain kit, and order one directly from them. Meanwhile, you wait for the manufactured to pack it up and ship it. Option 2: make a trip to a local home improvement store in the hopes you can find one that is going to match the specs of the sink you purchased, again without a drain kit. Option 3: in the case of replacing a preexisting sink with the new one you bought, without an included drain kit, the old drain kit is used. So, again, why is it an awesome and important feature for Kraus to include with their already amazing sink? Because 99% of the time a generic, 2nd party manufacturer or even an "authorized manufacturer" drain kit is not going to fit the drain opening exactly. "Who cares" You ask? You should care because the drain opening and the drain kit that go into should be, in my opinion, the "heart" of a sink. Especially for a one bowl/one-drain-opening sink. The quality, or lack thereof, of the seal can determine the longevity of the sink, cabinetry and everything below it. Having a perfect seal at the drain opening not only ensures that you will not have any leaks, it will also ensure that they integrity and strength of that sink is going to last beyond your lifetime. This sink and the included drain kit? PERFECTION! I know beyond any shadow of a doubt that I will never have to worry about the sink or what is below it!My rating....10 Stars for quality10 Stars for value and price10 stars for easy install
reviews.author: 1MaizeInNC

questions.question: "does the included basket strainer work when you have a disposal installed?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Rather than hook up a garbage disposal to the drain, the disposal will replace the drain, as it has its own flange and mounts directly to the sink. Hope this helps. Please feel free to reach out to us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com. Happy to assist. Best, Mike Kraus USA

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, the basket strainer still works when a disposal is installed.

questions.question: "Is there a flow restrictor that can be removed to increase pressure"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, there is a washer that can be switched out to increase flow rate from 1.8 to 2.2 gpm.

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Our KPF-1610 offers a flow rate of 1.8 gallons per minute (GPM) and is aligned with current Federal Water Conservation laws. There is also a different style washer that is included in a small bag for the end of the hose / spray head that can modify the flow rate from 1.8GPM to 2.2GPM. Hope this helps. Please feel free to reach out to us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any additional questions. Happy to assist. Best, Mike Kraus USA

questions.question: "Can you replace the screen assy in the spray head"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, the aerator can be replaced.

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for reaching out to us. Yes, our KPF-1610 Bolden Faucet offers a removable aerator for easy cleaning and maintenance. Hope this helps. Please feel free to reach out to us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any additional questions. Happy to assist. Best, Mike Kraus USA

questions.question: "Does this fit a standard existing hole in the counter?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, this faucet will fit existing holes in counter tops.

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Yes - all of our faucets require the standard diameter hole size of 1 3/8" (and up to 1 1/2") for installation. Hope this helps. Please feel free to reach out to us at 800-775-0703 or via email at customerservice@kraususa.com with any additional questions. Happy to assist. Best, Mike Kraus USA

questions.question: "can the arm that holds spray nozzle be moved up on the coils? or is it fixed in one position?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Corrie
answers.text: actually it can be moved up. The faucet set comes with a small allen wrench, on the back side of the arm there is a place that the wrench fits in, turn slightly to loosen the arm and move up to desired height, then tighten with same allen wrench. Mine was too low, now its perfect!!

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Although the arm will rotate. The arm on our Bolden KPF-1610 faucet cannot be moved up on the coil and is stationed on the faucet body. Please also feel free to call us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any questions. We'd be happy to assist you. Best, Mike Kraus USA

questions.question: "We have a standard 2 hole sink with a wide base at the bottom of the faucet (hopefully you know what I mean). Can we install this faucet?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, the faucet will work for your application you may need a deck plate to cover the other hole.

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Yes!. Our KPF-1610 Bolden Faucet requires a one hole installation. However, we also offer 10" deck plates (sold separately) to cover any existing holes from a 2 handle faucet. Our deck plates are also available in Stainless Steel, Chrome and Matte Black. Model #: DP01 Please also feel free to call us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any questions. We'd be happy to assist you. Best, Mike Kraus USA

questions.question: "Is the hose to the pull out plastic or stainless on this model?"
questions.author: Laylah

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: It is a braided hose, not metal.

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Hi Laylah, Thanks for your inquiry. The hose in our KPF-2230 is made out of Black Nylon. Please feel free to call us at 800-775-0703 or email us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any additional questions. Thanks, Kraus USA

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Thanks for your inquiry. Yes - Our KHU100-32 includes a complimentary strainer (BST-1) , bottom grid and Kraus towel all at no cost. Thanks

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The drain and strainer are included with the Single-Basin Stainless Steel Undermount Residential Kitchen Sink.

questions.question: "One of the reviews said that the faucet appears to be made of plastic. Is this true?"
questions.author: Kel

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: Hi Kel, Thanks for your inquiry. We've never created faucets made of plastic. Though there may be some plastic parts, (internal cartridge, etc) - all of our faucets are constructed out of metal. This faucet is also a favorite amongst many customers and would be a welcome additional to any kitchen. Please feel free to reach out to us at customerservice@kraususa.com with any questions you may have. Thanks

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, this is made from brass.

questions.question: "Is a garbage disposal drain is included as well as a regular drain?"
questions.author: Debby

answers.author: Kraus
answers.text: HI Debby, We do not carry garbage disposals in our inventory. However, our sinks are compatible with garbage disposals. Also, rather than hook up a garbage disposal to the drain, the disposal will replace the drain, as it has its own flange and mounts directly to the sink

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, a disposal drain is not included.
